translation.verifyPhoneNumberDesc: We will send a code - it help us keep yours account secure.
translation.otpVerification: Enter the 6-digit security code we send to you at ******
translation.isHideEndDate: Hide the end time of slot
translation.termsAndprivacy: By clicking 'Confirm booking,' you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, granting us permission to use your personal information in accordance with our policies.

desc.weSendSms: We've sent an SMS to confirm your booking, You can review your booking details there.
desc.bussRootDesc: Elevate your booking experience quickly and conveniently.
desc.bookingRejectDesc: Tell the customer why they were rejected.

cancel.confirmation: Are you sure to cancel booking
cancel.confirmationDesc: Booking slot will be available to others.

approve.confirmation: Are you sure you want to approve this booking
approve.confirmationDesc: Once approved, the customer will be notified, and the booking will be finalized.

reject.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reject this booking
reject.confirmationDesc: Once rejected, the customer will be notified, and the booking will be finalized.
